content: AT- BDSC Hao Peng, Ph.D. Professor School of Cyber Science and Technology Beihang University Office:First Hall G511 Email: penghao@buaa.edu.cn penghcs@gmail.com Hao Peng 彭浩 I am a Professor at the School of Cyber Science and Technology, Beihang University. I aim to make artificial intelligence technology easier and more accessible in industry. My broad research interests include structural data analysis, abnormal detection, text mining, multi-agent games, and industrial data mining and systems. My work often uses deep learning and reinforcement learning as design methodology.
